entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Marystown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:16 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 08:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: 36 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm except 2 cm north of Terrenceville. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm north of Terrenceville. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm north of Terrenceville. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2.
